No. 12

Bech Towels

Marrakech, Morocco

Bech towels is all about getting out into nature & traveling the world with the most luxurious Turkish cotton towel. We wanted to showcase just how versatile these towels really are & how perfect they are in just about any environment by shooting this campaign across the beautiful island of Bali.
